title: "22 Types of Childhood Verbal Abuse and Their Recognition"
excerpt: "A recent systematic review and meta-analysis identifies at least 22 unique types of childhood verbal abuse. Maltreatment during childhood significantly increases someone's risk of experiencing depression and anxiety in adulthood."
